creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: red coat with narrow yellow, black and cream stripes; embroidered border around front edges of coat, 8 inches of elaborate abstract design embroidery at each sleeve edge; lining of bright orange background with large blue flowers and groups of smaller flowers; loop motif embroidered design at chest height front and back; split seams where sides and back come together; embroidered edges on these seams
dimension: 48 1/4 x 71 in. (122.56 x 180.34 cm) (width sleeve edge to sleeve edge)
title: Coat
